name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: An Indian cuisine classic - creamy, spiced tomato sauce with tender chicken. High in protein and incredibly flavorful.

instructions.instruction: Make marinade: Mix yogurt, 1 tsp garam masala, turmeric, and salt.
Coat chicken pieces in marinade. Rest for at least 30 minutes, ideally 2 hours.
instructions.tip: Overnight marinating gives the best results.

instructions.instruction: Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F). Spread marinated chicken on a baking sheet and roast for 15 minutes.
Heat olive oil in a deep pan. Sauté onions until softened, about 8 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute.
Add remaining garam masala, cumin, and paprika. Cook for 30 seconds.
Add tomato paste and crushed tomatoes. Bring to a boil.
Simmer sauce on low heat for 10 minutes until it reduces to a purée consistency.
Add roasted chicken to the sauce. Stir to combine.
Add cream and simmer for another 5 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve.

tips: Use coconut milk instead of cream for a healthier version.
Make your own garam masala to control salt content.
Perfect for meal prep - flavor improves after a day.
storageInfo: Refrigerate for up to 4 days, freeze for up to 2 months.
servingSuggestion: Serve with basmati rice or naan bread.
variations: Shrimp or paneer work for a vegetarian version.
Add green chilies for extra heat.
Use low-fat yogurt to reduce calories.
